job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtAs a Software Engineer you will engineer code and test resilient highlyscalable software systems for both their web applications as well as backend APIs for their mobile apps that services their hundreds of thousands of customers They are significantly building out the engineering teams and are seeking talented coders who love growth to be a part of this expansionltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltugtltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtSolve technical problems by working closely with Agile scrum masters UX product managers and remote teamsltligtltligtReview and correct code for quality and designltligtltligtStrong written and verbal communication skillsltligtltligtManage the delicate balance between implementation complexity time to market and scalability and resiliencyltligtltligtWorking knowledge of database and code architecture best practicesampnbspltligtltligtDesign highperformance database schema and code architectureltligtltligtEmpower remote teams to deliver stable high performing and reliable codeampnbspThis requires regular interactions with remote teams in the morningsltligtltligtContribute significantly to sprints meet sprint deadlines help other team members with their sprint commitments and take the lead on urgent tasksltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtRequired Qualificationsltugtltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligt2 years of PHP development experience with Laravel or other similar languages like C C C Java C and net work as wellltligtltligtExperience writing SQL queries and engineering solid database schema designsltligtltligt2 years of experience in performance optimization debugging and unit testingltligtltulgt
